author: VinInn
body:
In this PR I introduce a CPE that just return position and error previously stored in a "map".
Typically values would be those of the SimHit.
An example of a filler from SImHit is also provided.

The main technical limitation is that it does not support multi-threading.
Given that it main use is to check tracking mostly with particle gun this is not a big issue.
title: Fake CPE
